channel.title: Spys and Intel Officers
channel.description:
What skills would you reckon SPys and Intel Officers would need, or be good to have?
im currently about to start a course at uni, and hopfully become a Spy or Intel Officer. My course is a Double Major in Criminology with a Major in Phycology.
I am planning to make a list of skills and knolodge that would benifit people in the field of intel and then learn/do as many as possible before, things including; Vehicle Licenses, Languages, Fighting Styles/Skills, Firearm skills, Theif skills such as Lockpicking and car hotwiring, etc.
So help me out

item.title: Spys and Intel Officers
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

lol me and my friend got really bored in brighton (you should know where this is if you live in uk) anyways so we decided to be spys (were 14 btw) we just pikced a random bloke to follow, funniest was when we lost a guy so we started following a guy on a bikeâ€¦ we followed him well far.

Read full topic
